about_the_game:
STORY

Sarah's consciousness has been taken over by an alien mind from the ancient race of Yith. After three years she has found herself back in control of her own body, awakening in the ruins of an ancient vault, but the Yith are not finished with her. They now demand her help finding an artifact taken from them, that if fallen into the wrong hands could result in the end of all humanity.

An original story inspired by The Shadow Out of Time by H.P.Lovecraft and The Challenge From Beyond by H.P.Lovecraft, Frank Belknap Long, Robert E Howard, C L Moore and Abraham Merritt

GAMEPLAY

Playing as Sarah you must explore the island you have awoken on to try to find a missing alien artifact. Game features classic point and click gameplay - explore various environments, find useful items, solve a variety of puzzles and uncover clues as to the island's past as you attempt to discover the fate of the Yith's missing artifact.

HINT SYSTEM

Game features several features to help you if you get lost without having to look up walkthroughs:

- Interactive objects can be made to glow at a click of a button so that you can find objects easier

- Hint system lets you control how much help you are given, from a simple yes/no answer to the question "can I solve this yet?" up to the whole solution if you get really stuck

content_descriptors.notes: Game depicts Lovecraftian horror elements relating to alien creatures and themes of possession. Also contains: blood, corpses, rituals, violence and swearing.
